Package server

Class BackEndServer

java.lang.Object
ocsf.server.AbstractServer
server.BackEndServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class BackEndServer extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
The BackEndServer class extends the AbstractServer class from the OCSF framework, providing a backend server implementation for handling client connections, messages, and interactions with a database for a specific application. This server initializes various threads for background tasks such as notifications and client status updates, and manages client connections.

    • DEFAULT_PORT

      public static final int DEFAULT_PORT
      The default port number on which the server will listen for connections.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DBController

      public static DatabaseController DBController
      An instance of DatabaseController used for interacting with the database. This variable provides access to the database controller, which is responsible for executing database queries and transactions. It is commonly used throughout the server codebase to perform database operations.

    • backEndServerInstance

      public static BackEndServer backEndServerInstance
      The singleton instance of BackEndServer. This variable holds the singleton instance of the BackEndServer class. It allows other classes to access the single instance of the server, typically for performing server-related operations or accessing server state.

  • Constructor Details

    • BackEndServer

      public BackEndServer(int port, ServerController serverControllerInstance, String userName, String password) throws SQLException
      Constructs a new BackEndServer with the specified port, server controller instance, and database credentials. It also initializes background threads for handling notifications, waiting list cancellations, and processing client requests.
      Parameters:
      port - The port number on which the server will listen for connections.
      serverControllerInstance - An instance of ServerController associated with this server.
      userName - The username for the database connection.
      password - The password for the database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if any sql error has occured

  • Method Details

    • getBackEndServer

      public static BackEndServer getBackEndServer()
      Provides access to the singleton instance of BackEndServer.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of BackEndServer.

    • handleMessageFromClient

      public void handleMessageFromClient(Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles messages sent from clients to the server. Delegates the processing of messages to the MessageHandlerFromClient class.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message sent from the client.
      client - The client that sent the message.
